summary: Tidus sword from Final Fantasy 10 now in Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
Name: Final Fantasy 10 Brotherhood Sword
Game: Skyrim
Version: 1.0
Date: July 30, 2014
Author: Andrew Z (andrewguy12)


Description
===========
Hello my friends! I decided to take my brotherhood sword mod from Oblivion and put it into Skyrim. I hope you like it!
The blade is one handed and a little transparent to give it that watery effect. I made it a little stronger than the
Daedra sword. Craft it at the forge (requires Ebony Smithing Perk), read location first!

Enjoy! Feel free to critique the sword, as I may update it depending on feedback :)

Location
========
As with the last sword, you gotta swim for it! Head to Riften, there will be a lake. In this area you will find Ted. Kill Ted.
Swim for the chest :P. In the chest you will find the ingots required to forge. Look at screenshots to direct you!

Install
=======
1. Simply drag and drop the "Data" folder to your skyrim directory. Should look something like this
C:\Program Files (x86)\Skyrim. If you have steam same concept C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim


Known Issues or Bugs
====================
I spent hours working on the light/reflection issue that was bugging us in Oblivion. It shouldn't be too shiny now :D. Let me
know if it still shines too bright
author: Andrew Z
